entry.def: A barrow is the same as a wheelbarrow .

entry.tran: （在街边贩卖水果等的）手推车
entry.def: A barrow is a cart from which fruit or other goods are sold in the street.
A barrow is a large structure made of earth that people used to build over graves in ancient times.

means.word_mean: 1. the quantity that a barrow will hold
2. (archeology) a heap of earth placed over prehistoric tombs
3. a cart for carrying small loads; has handles and one or more wheels
